Title: Requires landlords to include a line on the rent bill stating the amount of rent which represents the tenant's portion of property taxes for the premises
Summary: Requires landlords to include a line on the rent bill stating the amount of rent which represents the tenant's portion of property taxes for the premises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring landlords to include a line on the rent bill stating the amount of rent which represents the tenant's portion of property taxes for the premises
